attributes.action: Enact a Bill, similar to Americas GI Bill, that will enshrine the Military Covenant into Law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Bill will provide those serving in the Armed Forces, and those that leave, with all that they are entitled to in regards their housing, medical treatment, and further education and training AS OF RIGHT.  The new Law would make provision for the help and care of ex-Service personnel THROUGHOUT THEIR LIFE.
